trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*> method, which allows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> data to be custom filtered.
trans-unit.target: Expõe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*>método, que permite <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> filtrados de dados a ser personalizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The IDataPointFilter interface exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method, which takes a specific data point within a series and returns a `Boolean` value that determines whether that data point will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: A interface IDataPointFilter expõe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>método, que usa um ponto de dados específico dentro de uma série e retorna um `Boolean` valor que determina se esse ponto de dados será filtrado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform custom filtering: - Derive a new or existing class from this interface.
trans-unit.target: Para executar a filtragem personalizada:-derivar uma classe nova ou existente dessa interface.

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method to provide the custom filtering logic.
trans-unit.target: -Substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>método para fornecer a lógica de filtragem personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To initiate the filtering operation, call one of the `Filter` methods in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class that takes an IDataPointFilter object as its first parameter.
trans-unit.target: -Para iniciar a operação de filtragem, chame um do `Filter` métodos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>classe que usa um objeto IDataPointFilter como seu primeiro parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: For sample source code, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para exemplos de código fonte, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a particular data point in the series will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um determinado ponto de dados na série será filtrado.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called for each data point in a series, and returns a `Boolean` value indicating whether a data point should be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Este método deve ser chamado para cada ponto de dados em uma série e retorna um `Boolean` valor que indica se um ponto de dados deve ser filtrado.

trans-unit.source: To provide custom filtering, derive a new or existing class from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> interface and then implement this method.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer filtragem personalizada, derive uma classe nova ou existente do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>interface e, em seguida, implementam este método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>

trans-unit.source: Provide custom criteria matching logic, then return `true` or `false` to mark the data points to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Forneça a lógica de correspondência de critérios personalizados e retornar `true` ou `false` marcar pontos de dados a ser filtrada.

trans-unit.source: After this method has been implemented, use one of the `Filter` method definitions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class that takes an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> object as a parameter to perform the filtering.
trans-unit.target: Depois de implementar esse método, use um do `Filter` definições de método em de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>classe que leva um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>objeto como um parâmetro para executar a filtragem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: Filtered points, by default, are removed from a series.
trans-unit.target: Pontos filtrados, por padrão, são removidos de uma série.

trans-unit.source: They can also be displayed as empty points by setting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Eles também podem ser exibidos como pontos vazios, definindo o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: Filtered points can also be marked as filtered if they do not match filtering criteria, as determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>value.
trans-unit.target: Filtrado pontos também podem ser marcados como filtrado se eles não correspondem a critérios de filtragem, conforme determinado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> object that the data point belongs to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> objeto ao qual pertence o ponto de dados.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data point, which determines its position in the series.
trans-unit.target: O índice do ponto de dados, que determina a posição na série.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the data point is removed, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Se o ponto de dados é removido, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
